attributes.action: consider alternatives to top-up fees and the creation of a national bursary scheme in the forthcoming review of higher education funding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Innovation, Universities, Science & Skills Select Committee's report, ‘Students and Universities’ made these recommendations and they are fully supported by NUS. We ask that Prime Minister does not disregard these recommendations and ask that if he does he fully explains the basis for this decision.
